sentences.sContent: An illustration of China's dynamism is that a new company is formed in Shanghai every 11 seconds.
sentences.sCn: 说明中国活力的一个实例便是在上海每11秒钟就有一家新公司成立。

synos.tran: 说明；[印刷]插图；[经]例证；图解

words.tran: 说明的；作例证的；解说的
插图画家；说明者；图解者

trans.tranOther: a story, event, action etc that shows the truth or existence of something very clearly
